ch.bfh.ti.gapa.cli.config.reading.file

Class ConfigFileReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.bfh.ti.gapa.cli.config.reading.file.ConfigFileReader
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DefaultConfigFileReaderImpl

    public abstract class ConfigFileReader
extends java.lang.Object
    Reads a configuration from a valid json file. This is an abstract class. Subclasses overwrite createConfigFilePath() which creates the path to the config file.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

    • Method Detail

      • readMandatoryConfigFile

        public void readMandatoryConfigFile(RawInput rawInput)
        Reads configuration from valid config file. Throws if config file does not exist.
        Parameters:
        rawInput - Data is read into this instance.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if config file does not exist

      • createConfigFilePath

        protected abstract java.nio.file.Path createConfigFilePath()
                                                    throws java.net.URISyntaxException
        Will be overwritten by subclasses
        Returns:
        The path to a config file
        Throws:
        java.net.URISyntaxException - if the path could not be built.
